ingredients.ingredient: 2 large onions, cut into 1/4 inch wide strips
14 fillets Swedish anchovies, or regular anchovies
6 potatoes, peeled and cut into strips

cookingTips: Swedish anchovies are milder than regular anchovy fillets; use regular if Swedish unavailable
Cut potatoes and onions into thin, even strips for uniform cooking
Layer anchovy fillets between potatoes for even distribution of flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How should I layer the potatoes, onions, and anchovies for the best flavor?
